description: AI-powered sentiment analysis of customer interactions across support tickets, chats, and activities

test_cases.name: Sentiment Analysis Page Load
test_cases.description: Verify the sentiment analysis page loads correctly with all components
steps: Navigate to /sentiment-analysis
Verify page title contains 'Sentiment Analysis'
Verify page description is displayed
Verify overall sentiment score section is displayed
Verify navigation tabs are present (Overview, Support Tickets, Chat Messages, Activities)
Verify Overview tab is active by default
test_cases.expected_result: Page loads with all components visible and functional

test_cases.name: Overall Sentiment Score Display
test_cases.description: Verify overall sentiment score is displayed with correct formatting
steps: Navigate to sentiment analysis page
Verify overall sentiment section is displayed
Verify sentiment emoji is shown (üòä, üòû, or üòê)
Verify sentiment label is displayed (POSITIVE, NEGATIVE, or NEUTRAL)
Verify sentiment score is displayed with 2 decimal places
Verify total interactions count is displayed
Verify sentiment label color matches sentiment type
test_cases.expected_result: Overall sentiment score displays with proper formatting and colors

test_cases.name: Navigation Tabs Functionality
test_cases.description: Test navigation between different sentiment analysis tabs
steps: Navigate to sentiment analysis page
Verify Overview tab is active by default
Click on Support Tickets tab
Verify Support Tickets content is displayed
Click on Chat Messages tab
Verify Chat Messages content is displayed
Click on Activities tab
Verify Activities content is displayed
Click back to Overview tab
Verify Overview content is displayed
test_cases.expected_result: All tabs switch correctly and display appropriate content

test_cases.name: Overview Tab Content
test_cases.description: Verify Overview tab displays all summary information correctly
steps: Navigate to sentiment analysis page
Ensure Overview tab is active
Verify sentiment distribution bar chart is displayed
Verify overall sentiment breakdown pie chart is displayed
Verify summary cards for Support Tickets, Chat Messages, and Activities are displayed
Verify each summary card shows positive, negative, and neutral counts
Verify charts are interactive and responsive
test_cases.expected_result: Overview tab shows all summary sections with charts and data

test_cases.name: Support Tickets Tab
test_cases.description: Verify Support Tickets tab displays sentiment analysis data correctly
steps: Navigate to sentiment analysis page
Click on Support Tickets tab
Verify 'Support Ticket Sentiment Analysis' heading is displayed
Verify table is displayed with columns: Ticket, Title, Sentiment, Status, Created
Verify each ticket row shows ticket number, title, description preview
Verify sentiment column shows icon, label, and score
Verify status column shows colored status badges
Verify created date is formatted correctly
test_cases.expected_result: Support Tickets tab displays complete sentiment analysis table

test_cases.name: Chat Messages Tab
test_cases.description: Verify Chat Messages tab displays sentiment analysis data correctly
steps: Navigate to sentiment analysis page
Click on Chat Messages tab
Verify 'Chat Message Sentiment Analysis' heading is displayed
Verify table is displayed with columns: Room, Message, Sentiment, Created
Verify each message row shows room name and message content
Verify sentiment column shows icon, label, and score
Verify message content is truncated appropriately
Verify created date is formatted correctly
test_cases.expected_result: Chat Messages tab displays complete sentiment analysis table

test_cases.name: Activities Tab
test_cases.description: Verify Activities tab displays sentiment analysis data correctly
steps: Navigate to sentiment analysis page
Click on Activities tab
Verify 'Activity Sentiment Analysis' heading is displayed
Verify table is displayed with columns: Type, Message, Sentiment, Created
Verify each activity row shows activity type and message content
Verify sentiment column shows icon, label, and score
Verify message content is truncated appropriately
Verify created date is formatted correctly
test_cases.expected_result: Activities tab displays complete sentiment analysis table

test_cases.name: Sentiment Color Coding
test_cases.description: Verify sentiment colors are consistent and meaningful
steps: Navigate to sentiment analysis page
Verify positive sentiment is displayed in green color (#10b981)
Verify negative sentiment is displayed in red color (#ef4444)
Verify neutral sentiment is displayed in gray color (#6b7280)
Verify sentiment icons are consistent (CheckCircle, XCircle, AlertTriangle)
Verify sentiment emojis are consistent (üòä, üòû, üòê)
Verify color coding is consistent across all tabs
test_cases.expected_result: Sentiment color coding is consistent and meaningful throughout

test_cases.name: API Data Loading
test_cases.description: Verify sentiment analysis data loads from API correctly
steps: Navigate to sentiment analysis page
Wait for page to load completely
Verify loading spinner is shown initially
Verify data is displayed after loading
Check browser network tab for API calls to sentiment analysis endpoints
Verify all 4 API endpoints are called: overview, support-tickets, chat-messages, activities
Verify data is displayed in all tabs
test_cases.expected_result: Data loads successfully from all API endpoints

test_cases.name: Chart Functionality
test_cases.description: Verify charts are interactive and display correct data
steps: Navigate to sentiment analysis page
Ensure Overview tab is active
Verify bar chart displays sentiment distribution by category
Verify pie chart displays overall sentiment breakdown
Verify charts are responsive and resize with window
Verify chart tooltips show correct data on hover
Verify chart legends are displayed and functional
Verify chart colors match sentiment color scheme
test_cases.expected_result: Charts are interactive and display correct sentiment data

test_cases.name: Data Formatting
test_cases.description: Verify all data is properly formatted (dates, scores, text truncation)
steps: Navigate to sentiment analysis page
Verify sentiment scores are displayed with 2 decimal places
Verify dates are formatted consistently (MMM DD, YYYY HH:MM)
Verify text content is truncated appropriately (100 chars for messages)
Verify ticket numbers are prefixed with #
Verify status badges are properly styled
Verify all numeric values are readable and properly aligned
test_cases.expected_result: All data is properly formatted and readable

test_cases.name: Error Handling
test_cases.description: Verify graceful handling when API fails or data is missing
steps: Navigate to sentiment analysis page
Simulate API failure (network error or 500 response)
Verify error message is displayed
Verify error message is styled with red background
Verify error icon (XCircle) is displayed
Verify page remains functional after error
Verify retry mechanism works if available
test_cases.expected_result: Page handles API failures gracefully with proper error display

test_cases.name: Loading States
test_cases.description: Verify loading states are displayed appropriately
steps: Navigate to sentiment analysis page
Verify loading spinner is displayed initially
Verify loading spinner is centered and properly styled
Verify loading state disappears when data loads
Verify no flickering or layout shifts during loading
Verify loading state is shown when switching tabs
test_cases.expected_result: Loading states are displayed appropriately without layout shifts

test_cases.name: Responsive Design
test_cases.description: Verify sentiment analysis page is responsive on different screen sizes
steps: Navigate to sentiment analysis page
Test on desktop view (1920x1080)
Verify all content is visible and properly laid out
Resize browser to tablet view (768x1024)
Verify layout adapts correctly
Resize browser to mobile view (375x667)
Verify content is accessible and readable
Verify tables are horizontally scrollable on mobile
Verify charts are responsive and readable
test_cases.expected_result: Page is responsive and functional on all screen sizes

test_cases.name: Performance and Loading
test_cases.description: Verify page loads within acceptable time limits
steps: Navigate to sentiment analysis page
Measure initial page load time
Verify page loads within 5 seconds
Verify loading spinner is shown during data fetch
Verify no JavaScript errors in console
Verify all images and icons load correctly
Verify smooth transitions between tabs
test_cases.expected_result: Page loads quickly and smoothly without errors
